title: Mac Game Launch Issues (NA region)
body: I went to play a game today, banning and picking went fine, although the client seemed a little slow. As soon as I was about to go into the game, however, I immediately got the "Reconnect" button, and each time I clicked on it, it would go into the task bar and right back up, with the reconnect screen again. I've tried logging out, restarting my computer, and nothing seems to be working. Any help would be a appreciated.

replies.body: This sounds like a network issue reaching the game server, not specific to your Mac.  Let's start off with some basic troubleshooting through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help rule out possibilities.  Make sure to use the Mac options, though, and test it in a custom game.  Let me know if that works out for you.
